attributes.title: Appalling App
attributes.review: I was so excited to download this app, as I’ve always wondered what beautiful orage shade Trump is always wearing 🥰 while it doesn’t look good on him whatsoever, I really think I’d be able to pull it off. Maybe it’s Maybelline?? However, upon downloading, I was faced with a terrible situation. Almost immediately the sky fell dark and a swarm of crows began to circle my house. I pondered what must’ve brought on this conundrum, but it was clear what the culprit was— this monstrosity of an app. I looked down as thunder and lighting pierced through the air and I then saw a terrible sight on my phone that I may never be able to unsee— Dumpy Trumpy. I thought this app would just give me makeup tips and finally allow me to know his tanning and foundation secrets. I mean that orage shade is just really SOMETHING 😍 But no! I was presented with pages and pages of appalling policy and campaign information that only could’ve been written by a angsty teenage white boy who feels as though the world is indebted to him. Needless to say, I was frightened beyond belief. This app has not only caused terrible PTSD, but I’ve been plagued with rather weird occurrences and stage voices in my head. And it’s all been because of this awful app. It must be taken down immediately as the pain it has caused me is beyond repair. The only thing that’s been able to help me cope is the glorious wonderful angelic lovely app called Tik Tok. Oh how I love Tik Tok. It’s almost as if, I’d do anything to save it from tyrannical leaders who search to spread propaganda and hate when they can not control the minds of powerful young people 🥰😍🌸💫⭐️🌤☀️🌟⚡️ have a great day my to my fellow gen Z queens
